website_summaries.verdict: Appropriate for all types of flooring, this powerful upright from Dyson is designed for homeowners dealing with pet hair and dander.
cons: A few owners find it uncomfortable to hold and use

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Maybe I got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Maybe I got a lemon, but this thing doesn't work. Got this specifically because we have animals. It gets jammed and clogged CONSTANTY -- like every single time we use it. It doesn't pick stuff up. Constantly having to turn it over, pull out hair, unclog the tube, and it still does not work properly. Sorry I bought it, and even sorrier I paid $400 for it. Dyson Customer Service tells me to contact Amazon -- Amazon tells me to contact Dyson. Terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: norah

customer_reviews.title: To much suction for medium pile carpet
customer_reviews.text: I'm already a Dyson owner (Animal DC 41) and I really wanted to like the Animal 2. The vacuum was practically unmoveable on the carpet. The suction is so strong it locked down on the carpet. I called Dyson and was told there was nothing that could be done. There are a some workarounds on the internet but I'm not going to do that with such an expensive item. Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: Duffman

customer_reviews.title: Huge waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Huge waste of money. I decided to spend a little more on the vacuum cleaner because I wanted something that would last. The spinner brush broke after seven months. I contacted Dyson since I had saved the 1 year warranty and they said it covered everything but the part that had broken. They told me they would send me that part since it had been such a short time that we have had the vacuum cleaner, and they never did.
customer_reviews.author: Akt

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst vacuum I have ever purchased. I have had it since the beginning of August 2017 and it is broken...again!! This will be the 2nd time I have to take it to a repair shop in less than a year! And, contacting the company is a waste of time. I sent an email the 1st time it broke and I never heard back from them. I will never buy another Dyson product again. Complete junk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leachk

customer_reviews.title: Wrist breaker but it does suck!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson Animal. My first one lasted 10 years. You will get a work out using this vacuume! It hurts my wrists. I do not like the ball. It is hard to keep going straight, it turns when going backward against a wall. I do not like that the cord is shorter than my old Dyson. I do not like that it feels like you are breaking it when trying to get it to stand upright. I do not like that it gets hot when in use. However, I would buy it again and again because it does suck up the pet hair and my carpet looks beautiful after vacuuming. I vacuume 2-3 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: My old vacuum broke and I had always wanted a dyson so I began reading the reviews and all of the negative ones made me start to second guess the purchase. I decided to buy it anyway and I'm glad I did. It effortlessly glides on my carpet, is easy to maneuver and cleans very well. My only complaint is the hook to wrap the power cable is on the hose so anytime you want to use the hose, you have to unwrap all of the wire - but it isn't a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: ProjectAnew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product!! Not worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product! I ordered this as a house warming gift for my daughter and it literally fell apart on her the first use. Even better, I attempted to send it back and was only refunded half because the product was used. How do you find out something is defective without using it? I have spoken to many former Dyson owners about this issue and they had the same problem. Extremely disappointed and will be cancelling all times with amazon for allowing a defective item to be sold and not even refunding for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No problem with suction good for someone with a lot of pets
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a strong vacuum. On my medium plush rug I didn't have the terrible suction cup problem that some people are having. It did come with a thousand attachments and those would be good for small spaces but otherwise it gets a large room done quick. The vacuum will actually push its self forward and it picks up all the dust and dog hair and bird feathers.
customer_reviews.author: sjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Suction is great, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has the best suction. But that's the only good thing about this vacuum. It is so heavy and difficult to navigate it simply isn't worth it. It's so big that the head of the vacuum doesn't fit under anything and vacuuming is like a strenuous workout. Even more, the hose is almost impossible to use. The solid part of the hose is too long and the flexible part does not bend or expand easily. This was my first dyson product and will be my last. Going back to shark for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Russell

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We had the first version of this vacuum and LOVED IT! However newer is not always better and this vacuum sucked....haha....get it. But for real.....the thing pushes like a tank, it doesn't want to stay upright as the locking feature does not work, the "head" of the vacuum keeps popping off, and the rotating brush just stops when using it on carpet. We immediately returned this product. As awful as this product was, I do recommend purchasing version one of this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Cannot handle fur
customer_reviews.text: This model Is a significant disappointment over the previous model. I have an Australian Shepherd. The vacuum routinely loses all ability to suction anything and we have to disassemble it and clear out clogs over and over again. The photo taken is just two vacuuming sessions after clearing the last clog in less than two weeks’ time. In this new model it’s not as easy as pressing a lever to disassemble. It requires the teeny tiniest screwdriver you ever did see to detach the head to clear the clogs. On a positive, I have never had any trouble maneuvering the vacuum because of over suctioning. It’s easy to maneuver on all types of carpet.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum for dog hair! Out performs the competetion!
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum I have ever owned. I have two Labs that constantly shed. This is the only vacuum that has eliminated the hair issue in my home. I previously have owned Sharks and this vacuum out performs by far. I actually tried to order another Shark from their website. They refused to deliver to my 2nd home because my billing address was different. What a blessing in disguise! I will only purchase Dysons in the future. My house is 3700 sq feet under air. I vacuum the whole house daily so this vacuum takes a ton of wear and tear. It is not as easy to manuever as the Shark but it totally outperforms it cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Equine Creek

customer_reviews.title: Not for carpets or rugs
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase for carpets or rugs. The suction is so powerful it allows no air flow and suctions to the carpeted floors. It becomes immobile and the brush will stop turning. Its a difficult "workout" to vacuum with this unit as it will not glide at all across the carpet. The vacuum works fine on hardwood floors and "outdoor carpet", but not interior home low pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C Prior

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy but it's so easy to push and it picks everything off the floor ...
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews for quite awhile before I broke down and spent the money on this vacuum! We have four dogs currently and had one of the Shark stick vaccums...after a year, it just didn't cut it anymore. Once I got the Dyson Ball Animal 2, I didn't know how I even went a year with the other vaccum!! It's heavy but it's so easy to push and it picks everything off the floor right away without having to go over it multiple times. The pet attachement for furniture is an absolute miracle!! We have a husky/golden retriever so if this vaccum can pick up her furr, I promise, whatever animal you have, it will do just fine also!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Everything you’ve ever wanted in a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The new love of my life. I have recemtly had my carpets shampooed and thought they were clean. Well after filling the canister 3 times the day I received my new best friend here I know they were not. Just the amount of dust it removed against the walls is mind blowing. It gets right up tight to walls. The stair tool also amazing! I can’t recomend this vacuum enough and will now return to obsessively cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Mirriah

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I have bought a dyson. I really love the way that it pulls dirt and hair from the carpets. It is better than the shark that I currently own. However, there is definitely some differences between the 2 machines. I would like to see dyson's vacuums be able to do carpet that is not really a shag but has short fibers. The other thing is with the ball, it is not able to get under things like coffee tables, etc., The material quality I feel is not the best for the price that you pay for this machine. I will be keeping this Dyson and not giving it away!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: The quality of Dyson vacuum seemed to have decline from 10 years ago
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is probably the strongest vacuum out there. However, the company seemed to have taken the cost cutting approach, so the vacuum uses more plastic materials than metal. Also, the vacuum stick is not as easy to put in as before. My DC25 from before works smoothly that it feels almost perfect. The new Animal 2 (UP20) feels a bit clunky and not as user friendly. I read that Animal 2 has a newer model in UK, hopefully that gets introduced into the US. Lastly, perhaps due to more uses of plastic parts, the machine has a strong dizzying odor when the motor is turned on, hopefully that goes away in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this Dyson for a little over a year, to replace the old cheaper model we bought at Walmart. That vacuum was great, made me a Dyson fan. However, I cannot say the same of subsequent purchases. Perhaps we purchased a lemon., as someone else mentioned. It is flimsy feeling. It does a poor job vacuuming . I have to go over and over, then pull out the wand to get pieces it will not suck up. The wand can be very difficult at times to get back into the stand. I just spent the last half hour cursing it for not picking up as I vacuumed. Grrr!
customer_reviews.author: cattrek

customer_reviews.title: Forget the competitors
customer_reviews.text: I paid 500 for my first Dyson 14 years ago. I didn't want to pay another 500 when it finally burnt out so I bought a Hoover, what a mistake. No suction poor quality, in fact I returned it and bought another Hoover thinking the fist was maybe just bad. No.. their product is just bad I returned it and paid the 500 for another Dyson and I'm so glad I did. It's really night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rstar

customer_reviews.title: Won't work on dense carpet.
customer_reviews.text: This is nicely designed vacuum cleaner with incredible suction. However, it can't be used on dense carpet since the suction is not adjustable. It clamps down on the carpet and can't be moved. In my opinion, this is a design flaw, hence the low rating. I have an older Dyson Ball that I love. Unfortunately, I'm going to switch to another brand due to this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Compton

customer_reviews.title: Da bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! I own two dogs and have killed off several vacuums in the past year alone. (I kid you not.) The Dyson is simply amazing. It pulls an incredible amount of dirt, etc. out of my carpets and doesn't get stuck! I do occasionally turn it over and pull some hair off of the brush roller, but compared to the other vacuums I've tried--reputable brands and models--this is easily the best. I read the reviews that say the suction is too much, but I haven't found that to me the case. My carpet is medium-pile.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: Quality has Dropped Over the Years.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be cheaply made. Hose is horrible and stays tight all the time so you drag the vacuum with you instead of being able to reach up with the extended hose. Doesn't seem to be a click button to lower it into the vacuuming position unless I am missing it somewhere. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark The Twain

customer_reviews.title: If you have nice carpeting, do not buy this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is extremely powerful. If you have a new carpeting, it is too powerful. I cannot move it 1 inch. Because I bought it on Amazon I may not be able to get a full refund because I don’t have the box .There is supposed to be built in height adjustment. This machine does not adjust to plush carpeting. Dyson was no help at all. I have been approved to return the machine So we shall see if I get a full refund. Do not buy this if you have thick carpet!!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase if you have plush carpet!
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson works fine on hard surfaced floors or a standard carpet. However, on plush carpets, the vacuum is completely inoperable. The suction is so powerful that it literally sucks in the carpet making the vacuum impossible to push and stops the roller brush within seconds. I at first thought I received a lemon; but I called the Dyson helpline and was told that most Dyson models will not work on thicker carpets. I used this machine all of one time and had to return it. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: I I'm not going to talk about how well this vacuum works there are plenty of other reviews that cover that in great detail. But I do want to cover as a suggestion for new owners. I had vacuum the day prior with my existing vacuum and when this came I unboxed it Andre vacuum the house you really have to keep a close eye on the container because unbeknownst to me I overfilled it in one room so this vacuum does a fantastic job of getting up dirt and dog hair out of a carpet you didn't even know you had.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M. Rosleck

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum stopped working right after my 30 day return window. This is the first Dyson we have bought we ended up having this exact one returned and a replacement send, same thing happened and I wasn't able to return this one...so we tried a different Dyson foolishly and the loss of suction seems to be an issue with both our Dyson vacuums. And of course I'm stuff with a broken vacuum that cost a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Pestarino

customer_reviews.title: Not for Carpet 1” High & Above
customer_reviews.text: Shame on Dyson for its packaging and ads. I’m sure this vacuum is perfect for carpets in convention centers in hardwood floors, but it certainly is not for carpet 1 inch tall and above. My wife could not budge it. I pushed as hard as I could and could barely get it to go. The suction was so incredibly great, that it stuck to the carpet and pulled up things from the pad that had been there for 200 years. However, because it was sucked down so low, it failed to pick up little things right in front of the vacuum; it just pushed them along. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Badger

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction.  Poor Overall Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has lots of suction as Dyson is famous for. However I have issues. The mechanism that locks it in the upright position is very weak and it is impossible to wheel this around without it releasing. Now, after 6 months use, it has started an annoying loud squeal caused by the ball rubbing against its frame. Why? I have done some limited disassembly and cannot find a solution. These issues alone don’t warrant 2* rating. But when the price is considered, these flaws are totally unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Valmore

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to maneuver on carpet
customer_reviews.text: My guess is that because of the superb cleaning power of this machine it makes it very very difficult for one to maneuver over any kind of carpet. I have hardwood, ceramic and carpet floors and it was ok on the floors but almost impossible to push on the carpet. Not only is it difficult to push on the carpet, the cleaning wand and attachments are very awkward to use. Do not waste your time ordering this product, you will only have go through the hassle of returning it as I did. The video on the webpage is very misleading.....
customer_reviews.author: Donna Weaver

customer_reviews.title: What stinks? This Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. I should have stuck with my Shark, but was curious about the Dyson, so I took a shot. It’s incredibly heavy and difficult to maneuver. The attachment hose is so stiff, it takes far too much to stretch it. Also, the thing is so inflexible, one can’t vacuum UNDER anything! I have four dogs and the fur LITERALLY FLIES, but I have to move heavy furniture to vacuum under it because this has no low profile design to get under things. I’m adding this to the “land of NOPE” and won’t buy another. For $400, I expected much more out of Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Ever -Must Have !!!!
customer_reviews.text: So it's awesome! Only reason for 4 stars is the suction is so great I can no longer vacuum my shag rug, which my old Dyson/animal vacuum did work on it but they have definitely increased suction. It seems a little cheaper in the plastic but only time will tell. My last one lasted 15 years great investment! It also reminds me of my self propelled lawn mower it seems to go on it's own. My only other complaint is the part that pulls out is very difficult to put back in. Everyone should have a Dyson !!!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum from the Amazon warehouse that had it listed as "used very good." However, I received the vacuum that appeared to be new, yet it was missing the wand of which is number three on the set up instructions and the head would not 'click' into place as shown in step number one of the instructions. Needless to say, I have scheduled a return for a full refund, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: AP Member

customer_reviews.title: Suction issues
customer_reviews.text: My first Dyson Animal - which worked great with 2-3 labs in the house and I loved-gave out and we decided to purchase the Animal 2. The suction was overwhelming to the point I had difficulty pushing the vacuum- even with two hands and at some points the roller brush would stop rotating due to a lack of airflow (I am assuming). We read a review from another retail site to remove the thin black foam gasket on the roller head.. It seems to be working okay now, but I am not thrilled that it wasn't working "out of the box".
customer_reviews.author: B. Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Look out dust bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to pick up anything you value cause this suction is strong!! I could not be more in love with a household appliance! It would be nice if the cord was retractable and if the hose was a little more user friendly on stairs so I guess I could be a little more in love but such a small price to pay! This vacuum does its job well, I have had no trouble pushing it. We have area rugs and it transitions beautifully. My kids give me plenty of reasons to whip this baby out and it has met my expectations for a quality vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Hebbas

customer_reviews.title: It's my third Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Three Dysons. Three. I just received the newest one, the Animal 2. I'll never buy another brand. Ever. An unheard of 5 year warranty? Our carpet was matted with short dog fur and the difference was immediate. My wife almost had a stroke when she found out how much I'd paid, but on seeing the results, she was blown away. The house even smells cleaner, which she noticed right away. Not only do they work extremely well, but they're also a pleasant machine to look at. Do yourself a favor if you're undecided and just buy a Dyson. Also, no, I don't receive any compensation from Dyson, but do have the utmost faith in their product.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So it started out with great suction. But I’ve had an issue with it clogging with hair. I have one cat and med long hair. The roller get hair wrapped around it almost instantly and smells like it’s burning. The picture is after I cleaned it then vacuumed only my living room (14x10 size). I don’t want. Vacuum that takes 20 mins to clear the hair from every time I vacuum. It’s stinks up my house like burning garbage. Plus the black thing is the middle of the roller gets clogged in the bearings and no way to get that hair out. The only video online was for removing the faceplate not the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a year. Too bad...
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited that this vacuum was on sale so we bought one. It worked great the first couple of months. Suction was great. The attachments are a little awkward, but overall fine. Unfortunately, after a few months it started smelling like something electrical was burning. Now less than a year later we can't use it as the burning smell is overpowering and I'm afraid it might catch fire. I took the front roller attachment apart to see if something was stuck inside but don't see anything. Will throw it away and get a Bissel or Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie-M

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a Dyson Animal for almost 20 years. One of the first models. I was expecting to get similar quality, but this one seems like a piece of junk compared to the old one. The plastic is weak and very flimsy. It's like they did everything they could to cut costs on this model. Even our kids commented on how this seemed like a toy vacuum and they think it will break. We have pets and we vacuum frequently. I'm not sure how this could cost $390. We paid more for our first Dyson years ago and it was worth it. Don't expect this one to last as long.
customer_reviews.author: btassini

customer_reviews.title: Devours dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical when this first arrived as a lot of dog hair got caught in the brushes with the first use. However, now that we've cleaned with it a couple times there is no longer a problem. Seems the old canister did not pick up nearly as well so now the carpets and floors are super clean! Very pleased. Haven't had a chance to use many of the attachments but I'm looking forward to cleaning things in hard to get to places.
customer_reviews.author: JS49

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suction, worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: It's the best suction I have ever encountered by decent amount. I compared side by side to Animal Pro (which was previously the winner) and this one is definitely stronger. The only downside is they have not figured out a way for the detachable hose to work well. It bends awkwardly at its attachment point and will certainly tear/rip at some point. It does not allow for very far reach either. The additional tools available are well worth the extra cost, love them all! The flat suction attachment is AMAZING for hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum machine
customer_reviews.text: I spent $375 on an unfinished product, It’s the worst vacuum machine I could never imagine. I have had it for nearly 2 years, only used for less than 10 times, and now it's falling into 5 different pieces. IT'S JUST NOT WORKING. 1. The machine is very very heavy, and it’s almost impossible to vacuum without the back tube part doesn’t fall out at least 5-10 times every time. 2. It’s impossible to use on the carpet... 3. The purple container button on the top, which also help secure the container on the machine fall off. Therefore, it’s impossible to use the machine now. (It’s basically a vacuum machine without container for dust)
customer_reviews.author: DI WU

customer_reviews.title: Amazing vacuum for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for pet owners!!! It's so powerful! I never thought the rugs for my bunnies are so dirty until I used the Dyson vacuum. It's definitely a game changer. I think I'll never go to other brand. However, I give 4 star because it's so hard to use it one high pile carpet. I have two big rugs one low pile and one high. The vacuum works easily on the low pile one but it's so hard to use on the high one! It's like an intense workout to move the vacuum around. So if you have hardwood or low pile carpet this vacuum is absolutely amazing but avoid it if you have high pile.
customer_reviews.author: Weiyan Chen

customer_reviews.title: Too much power in a small body
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the headline will make sense unless you try it out, but the machine is a smaller body than my larger Animal dc14. Whenever I try to vacuum a smaller or thinner rug, the Animal 2 suctions down on the rug making it impossible to move. There is no adjustment on the head as it is auto adjusting so it just won't work on that large area rug. It works great on the wall to wall carpet in other areas of the house though. I wish I had paid more for the larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Hookedongin92

customer_reviews.title: OVERRATED
customer_reviews.text: decided to give Dyson a shot because of all the hype. What a joke!! I've owned many vacuums over the years from Kirby to hoover to bissell. I have also owned a few Sharks. When my last one died, I decided to see what all the Dyson hype was about!! HUGE mistake! I knew out of the box on first use it didn't hold a candle to my Sharks but against my better judgment thought surely there has to something special about it, after all, it's a Dyson! Fast forward to 5 montha later: I DESPISE this vacuum! Honestly, it's probably going to Goodwill this week and I'll order another Shark! Chalk it up as LESSON LEARNED!!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Moore

customer_reviews.title: Pet Hair Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all! I can’t even express my surprise....at the filth I’ve been living in! I have had the same dyson since 2009 and I guess I never noticed how little it was suctioning until I bought this. All the fur/dust in the photo is from my master bedroom. It’s absolutely disgusting!! I even vacuumed this morning with my old dyson. I highly recommend this vacuum. I have a husky and two cats and in the past was vacuuming every day day and drowning in fur. I have a feeling I won’t be spending so much time vacuuming now :)
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Piedra

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is a kind of heavy, especially, comparing to my old Dyson Turbine Head DC23 but much easier to turn and push around. Being a brand new one, it has more vacuuming power than my old DC23. This came with three attachments but I have not used them, yet. One thing noticed is it bogs down and almost unable to move when going over a dense area rug. I thought Dyson engineer had thought about this but it turned out they have not. In other areas, I have not had an issue, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable suction; a bit klunky to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Dyson vacuum cleaners in the last 10 years. This is by far the most powerful I have owned, especially for carpets. Having a machine that can easily and thoroughly pick up hair and crumbs was important to me, and this vacuum exceeds expectations in that area. The main challenge with this machine is how relatively difficult it is to switch attachments. Compared to a previous Dyson ball animal vacuum it feels like the parts are stiffer or harder to manipulate in some way. It is also pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Works great to pick up fur!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! We had an old Dyson that had seen better days and decided to replace it. We chose this model because we have four cats and two dogs. It picks up so well! We are really pleased with it. I will say, though, that it's a tad hard to push on carpeting, but you get used to it. I swear it picked up dust bunnies from China!
customer_reviews.author: CGaudreau

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up dirt better than any other vacuum....but.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really does a great job of cleaning my carpets. I'm just confused why something with such a high price tag is made out of cheap, flexible plastic. The vacuum doesn't even have a switch to click it into place.... You just kinda have to force it to "click" so it stands upright. feels like it won't last very long despite the excellent suction.
customer_reviews.author: Beer is food

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning and a workout!
customer_reviews.text: We also have a Dyson Ball Animal with the full filter system, but bought this version as a present for a family member who has dogs. It really does clamp itself down on carpet, almost excessively to the point where I was afraid we'd damage the carpeting if we left it in place too long. Much more usable on thinner carpeting or bare floors. Aside from that, Dyson vacs are excellent and have given us no trouble in years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nate A.

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum EVER.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a lot of vacuums over the years searching for one that REALLY gets things clean. Love, love, love this Animal. Goes so easily from my tile onto the carpet and still picks up all. It is amazing how much dirt & lint it picks up-time after time. Loved it so much I bought one as a combined birthday present for my son and daughter-in-law. (They asked for it). Perfect with their 3 dogs. Even the ceiling fans sparkle now. Theirs came with the added accessory attachments in a case. Great add-on
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! Worth the pricetag. Love the color too. Easy to clean and has great suction. Works well on all the surfaces in my house. I do find the hose difficult to use but I don't use it much for that function as I have a cordless Dyson I use for cleaning baseboards, couches, air vents, and quick clean up messes. The corded upright is perfect for deep cleaning days (which I do often because of toddlers, 3 full-time indoor cats, 4 part-time indoor dogs). Works fantastically well to get the pet hair out of the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Rodger & Candace B.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great maneuverability and suction. The weak point is storing the attachments: they don't fit anywhere on the machine, and end-up in the back of the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great investment in your home! Best vacum EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was insane for spending this much money to vacum my house that was until I used this Dyson. It picks up dirt you didnt even know was there. I have never been so excited to vacum before! It's fun to see how much it picks up. I will never buy another brand of vacum again!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, it works way better than I could have ever imagined. My clean carpet was really not very clean. The proof was in this vacuum. It's easy to empty the dirt out of this vacuum, it is light weight, moves from carpet to tile floors easily. It was easy to go from vacuuming to using the attachments for cleaning the couch or the baseboards. I would recommend it to anyone that has pets in the house. I think it was a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too powerful, not a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Ok- listen to me on this one- I said I wanted a vacuum that could almost pull the carpet off the pad it was so strong. That’s exactly what this is and it was AWFUL. No way to alter the suction power, so if you have carpet that is higher quality (denser than builder grade) it will auction so powerfully you will need to use all the strength in both arms to move it. Not good. If you have thin carpet, this is great. But be warned- it could literally be too powerful. Sad it didn’t work because the suction was great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, can be difficult to push with high carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum! We have two cats and a dog and this vacuum sucks up all the hair. I haven't been able to find a vacuum that has powerful suction without getting clogged. Would definitely recommend purchasing this! The only downfall, which others had mentioned is that if you have higher carpet it can be very difficult to push because the suction is so good. For me I don't mind working a little harder because it works so well, but it can be a little of a workout. If you have lower carpet though you shouldn't have any problems! Definitely love this vacuum though, wish I would have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Broke in about a year and a half!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum just broke on me and it didn't get used much until recently when we moved. Bought it Black Friday on 2017 and yesterday it stopped sucking anything up. I cleaned it out, cleaned out the brush, checked the hoses, and nothing fixed it. I worked really well the first month I had it as the suction was fantastic but that feature died off really quickly. Very disappointed! I waited forever to get a Dyson and finally jumped on it when I was pregnant so spending a ton of money to get only a year a half out of it is unacceptable!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were mixed which gave me some pause. A friend of mine loves hers. I took the dive and am very sorry I did. The build: seems cheap. Getting the vacuum to stay locked in the upright storage position was a painful task. Rugs: small area rugs are an absolute nightmare. Too much suction. The biggest problem is the floating head combined with the suction. Little items would not be pick up, for instance a piece of corn or a mini pretzel. The head just pushed them along. This might be fine for a family that is tidy and no kids. Didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Whitley

customer_reviews.title: I liked my older, none ball type Animal vacuum better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my older wheel type Dyson Animal vacuum. Nice vacuum but i think i like the older design better, the one without the ball. Seemed a little better made to me. I don't like the way the handle locks in the upright position, if you try to move it by rolling it on it's back wheels, it will sometimes unlock on you and the head will drop to the floor back into its working position. The tank seems a little smaller too. Anyway, i think its better than the new Cordless they are trying to push.
customer_reviews.author: Fred P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I regret spending so much on this vacuum. I’ve used it a bunch, so I assume I’m stuck with it. I had a DC-14 for years that I adored, so I thought this would be worth the investment. It isn’t. The brush attachment doesn’t pick up pet hair off any hard surface, especially anything remotely staticky. The head falls down everytime I tilt the vacuum to roll it somewhere. I used to be able to vacuum my throw rugs with other vacuums; this ate one of my bath rugs. Really not what I expected from this company. I wish they still made the high-quality DC-14.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great suction!
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly. I can not believe the dirt it sucks up. I only gave it four stars because, the we struggle to return the hose attachment to the handle; it is not as easy as it looks like it should be. Also when putting it in the upright position to park it, it does not always stay. I also have rugs throughout my house, this does not work on them at all! But I guess that is what you would expect with a vacuum with a lot of suction!
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Best vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best vacuum I’ve ever had. It works SO well. Blown away by how well it picks up. Easy assembly. Suction power is fantastic. Moves easily. Gets into smaller spaces better than most big vacuums do. Attachments are securely and compactly stored and don’t fall off while you are using it. Attachment hose has a good reach. I’m very happy with it! Highly recommend. It’s worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: janna woodfall

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Else Will Do!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Dyson. I decided to upgrade after 11 years and I must say I am very pleased with the changes in the Animal. Its smoomther rolling around and suction is much better. But I am comparing it to my 11 year old. The new one picked up additional dirst as I just used the old one the day before receiving the new one. And its LIGHTHER. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Okay vac
customer_reviews.text: I like the carpet cleaning ability of this vac. It pulls up a lot of dirt my other vac left behind plus it cleans out easy if you do it outside where the dirt can fly. The negative is the unwieldiness of the hose/wand design and attachments. The hose will not stretch out and pulls the sweeper over. It's a true, frustrating struggle. Secondly, the small attachments don't allow you to efficiently sweep a large, non-carpeted floor. A 12 inch wide attachment would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works good but clogs up fast and easily
customer_reviews.text: Works good but clogs up fast and easily. Would have given it five stars if they had designed it without the rinsable filter that needs to be washed every other use. If Kenmore can do it so can Dyson. I still think it's worth the $300 I paid over the $175 Kenmore which burned up in two years of heavy use. We have a Siberian Husky/wolf cross that is a heavy shedder. Sucks up pet hair like nobody's business but ads to filter washer intervals.
customer_reviews.author: Rotten

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vacuum. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum less than an hour and feel the need to review. My house was professionally cleaned yesterday with my old standby Dyson I’ve had for a few years. Always felt it worked great but really wanted to try the Animal after hearing about its suction power. To my eye my rugs looked immaculate but I went over all of them (one is a pretty high pile) and it was a breeze. I wonder if the negative reviews were for people who didn’t have the automated brush turned on, because it basically self propels. Well I got an entire canister full of dirt and dog hair (a dog that is only here on occasion). Unreal. I’m obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this Dyson. It does everything described, very happy with it. The only reason for four stars is the packaging. Was packed in a larger box that had no padding. Was very concerned when I opened the outer box, the box that contained was completely split open down the side and at one end. Fortunately the vacuum wasn't harmed. Strangely the outer box had no damage at all, so I have to wonder if the Dyson box was damaged when packed or broke open in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn G Schwesinger

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE FELT CARPET PAD !
customer_reviews.text: Returned it due to suction TOO strong - The vacuum head will pick up the carpet and hold onto it and you're stuck ! The customer service person told me that you need to have FELT CARPET PAD because with Foam pad there is inadequate air intake back through the spinning brush/ vacuum head to break the hold. Too bad they don't tell you that before you order !!!
customer_reviews.author: Blues Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality quality quality that’s Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about the Dyson it without a doubt the best vacuum cleaner on the market but when the post office delivered it the box look like it been in World War II I’m just thankful that it nothing was broke and so far it seems that’s the case but just be assured that the post office isn’t always the best way to ship great Purchase
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of cat hair like an eraser on pencil lead.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled without instructions (very intuitive snap and click). The head dropped down when vacuum started and with two cats I emptied the canister twice in my living room. I then used a carpet spray and the bristles scrubbed the carpet so well once dry it felt wonderful under my bare feet. Used the handheld vacuum powered brush and it erased the cat hair from the cushions and curtains. Great vacuum best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this ball Dyson!!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy will suck carpet off the floor! What a great change from my other dyson. This one just rolls around everything. sometimes if you don't push it all the way forward when stopping it dont click shut and will fall back on you or the floor, these are tuff machines. no problems! I'll stick with dyson the rest of my life!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb K.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Dyson!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson vacuum purchase. The first one was not the ball technology. Definitely maneuvers a lot easier around furniture, etc. We have 2 German shepherds and the suction power to pick up hair we thought was out of the carpet is remarkable. The wand could be a little easier to take off and out back but overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine R Conterez

customer_reviews.title: cleans carpets and floors
customer_reviews.text: I've had many vacuums and the Dyson the best ! I had just vacuumed my carpet and floors on a Sunday then the Dyson arrived on Tuesday and of course I had to try it immediately .... I was amazed at how much was still left in the carpet from my old vacuum. I'll never use any other it's great Treat yourself, I did it was a birthday present to me
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E.

customer_reviews.title: An overall disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a bit of a disappointment. It is rather powerful. It is also rather useless on stairs and hardwood floors. There is no suction at the edges and the shape of the head does not allow it to fit under the edges of furniture or cabinets well. It is quite clunky and many of the handle parts feel far too weak for such a heavy vacuum. In just over 3 months, the plastic around the accessory attachment point is showing excessive wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleans well. However, you need to have a lot of strength to move it along. I also seem to have a lot of trouble figuring out how to dislodge the hose and using other attachments every time I use it. It could all do with my age. I am not young nor strong. I also wish there was a retractable cord, but that is because I was spoiled by my last vacuum. But overall it does do well on pet hair and other dirt and grime.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Worst Accessory Handle on the Market
customer_reviews.text: As an upright vacuum this does a good job but the accessory handle is so poorly conceived, one attempt to vacuum furniture will make you instantly regret this (significant) purchase. I read the other reviews warning about the accessory handle and ignored them, I mean how bad can an accessory handle be? I now understand, it's that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum is very heavy. Hose is stiff and does not extend without pulling over the vacuum cleaner. I had to order a new hose because with the rigidity of the hose, it cracks easily. No lift away option. Due to rigid hose and no lift away option, vacuuming stairs is very difficult. Suction on bare floor is poor but cleans carpets very well. I would not recommend purchasing this vacuum simply because of its poor maneuverability. My back could not handle the weight of the vacuum. The Dyson company is great to work with. The parts are easy to replace which is why I chose it over another Shark. If I did it over again, I would buy a shark.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bignell

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to usen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum for an extremely low pile rug and hardwood floors. The suction is so strong that it cannot he used on any sort of rug/carpet without breaking out in intense sweat. I couldn’t even finish vacuuming my rug before I had to give up and sit down for a while. This vacuum absolutely needs an option for suction adjustment or it is too difficult to use. Even on hard floors, my wrist was aching from the effort of turning it. I have to send it back, it’s just too hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Incredible suction!
customer_reviews.text: This Animal is off the charts for suction! I even spent a bit of time with customer service asking if there was a way to reduce the suction.. it's amazing! Stairs are awkward, it's heavy, there's a stretchy tube with attachments, lots of attachments. Nothing gets by this vac! And customer service it out of this world, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: singingbyrd

customer_reviews.title: Buy now you won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has two dogs one has long hair and dander and hair and mess they make is unbelievable! Both my daughters have these vacuums and love them so I thought I would buy my youngest daughter one as a present. This vacuum is on believable we’ve had it for six months now and it works just as well today as it did when we first got it there’s so much dog hair we have to clean the container after every use. It does A phenomenal job and work every penny
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: This thing reall is an animal for picking things up. My wife loves it. Only downside is that if your carpet pile is too long or thick it can really struggle because the suction is so strong. Dyson recommends cutting out a small piece of the rubber gasket to slightly loosen suction. It works great now
customer_reviews.author: gdawg

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: We held off on buying one of these for a super long time, because the price just seemed outrageous, but you really do get what you pay for. I wish we had bought this ages ago, because it made our carpets look like new and is so easy to clean. It's a little tough to get used to on the stairs, but once you find a rhythm, the cleaner is way less bulky than other vacuums so it's easy to get up and down. If you have multiple pets like we do, definitely invest in this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, terrible suction
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that is worked... once. After that, the suction was near non-existent. So, the beater bar would just pull up dust and fibers from the carpet and spit them out all over it. There has to be a design issue as the base of it clogs SO easily. On a plus side, the wand works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum that won’t vacuum carpet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am literally blown away. I was so excited to get this product and then so disappointed when I got it and it would not run on my carpet. I called Dyson twice and both times all they would say was it’s not compatible with some carpet. I have nice carpet but not shag carpet or anything out of the ordinary. The moral of the story is this is an overpriced vacuum that won’t vacuum carpet!!!!! Who has ever heard of such a crazy thing???? Do NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IF YOU HAVE CARPET. This is not an Amazon issue it’s a Dyson issue. I will never buy a Dyson product again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Vanoose

customer_reviews.title: perfect for heavy shedders
customer_reviews.text: the vacuum is so strong on the suction that it collapses the accordion hose as you vacuum, j swear it made it look like the previous person never vacuumed st all... I cant believe I waited this long ti get s dyson.. I have 2 cattle dogs, one with short wiry hair an the other with fluffy rabbit fur an this vacuum works better then any other vacuum I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE!
customer_reviews.text: HOLY HECK! This thing cleanssssss! When I first opened it up, I only did my living room rug, which had recently been vacuumed. I could NOT believe my eyes seeing the dirt and dust that in the canister after one pass. It sucked up stuff we had no idea was in there. Y’all. SO. MUCH. DIRT. This thing is an absolute beast! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very  solid vacuum cleaner overall and good for floors without carpet as well.
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum and it works well, especially for the price. I've had higher priced vacuums that worked the same but costs two to three times more. I do wish it had a light system on it to see really see underneath furniture and other dark places.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Jones

customer_reviews.title: What's NOT to Like about this vacuum cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to decide upon a new vacuum cleaner. I had a Dyson before, but after 12 years of operation, it was time for a new one. I run an AirBnB and it's an important decision to have a vacuum that is going to perform well. This went beyond my expectations, mostly because of the sucking power and the accessories., not to mention the way the machine follows me when I'm using the hose to vacuum hard surfaces. It's quite ingenious and I can get to every crevice, corner and fan blade easily and effortlessly. I'm pretty sure this machine is going to last me a long time. It was well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: P.K.

customer_reviews.title: A full powered heavy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful vacuum. That said, you need to know it is heavy, but maneuverable. If you have carpets that need the deep suction and beater bar, it is ideal. The performance on big area rugs is great as well. But if you just have some dog hair to sweep up, I find it too bulky to drag out, and just use a stick broom.
customer_reviews.author: okieshopper

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself a few months ago and was so impressed I bought one for my longtime companion too. I've had Dyson before and they did a nice job but nothing like this. My 7 year old carpeting actually came to life. You can see it and you can feel it when you walk accross it. The suction is incredible. You won't believe how much is in the bin. I honestly believe my home smells better right after I vacuum. I have never recommended a product this strongly. I'd give it 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinetgo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and this vacuum is amazing! It def picks up every hair. Now I don’t recommend it for small area rugs (it eats them) and also the machine itself is pretty heavy.. very powerful but it sometimes makes it difficult to actually do the stairs because you have to fight the power of the suction to actually extend the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M Sosa

customer_reviews.title: It does everything
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a Dyson. They just were so much money. It's like is it really worth the money for that high price? DEFINITELY YES!!! I recommend a Dyson all the way. It does everything but push itself. One of the best purchases we have made in a long time. So Thanks for selling us such a amazing vacuum for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get if you have normal length carpet
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t even push this on my carpet because of how high the suction was. Suction was amazing, but it’s not realist with normal carpet. This would work best with flat type carpet.
customer_reviews.author: It’s me

customer_reviews.title: Dyson ball Animal 2 is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Dyson owner for many years. I recently purchased this Dyson Ball Animal 2 upright vacuum. I didn't realize it could be better than my old model, but they found ways to improve their vacuum. This model goes under refrigerators and kitchen cabinets better than my old model. The brush allows hair to pass to the canister better so it is not as much, or anything to get out of the brush when finished. Switching from floor to handheld tools much quicker. Dyson co+ more than other vacuums but they also last for 15+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Donell B Eichler

customer_reviews.title: More powerful suction.
customer_reviews.text: This new unit is an upgrade to the former model essentially in the area of suction. While I am amazed at what it picks up, the suction is so strong that I can not use it on low pile throw carpets. In addition, many of the attachment points for spare parts have been removed. I found those points useful to keep me from going back across the house to retrieve parts. Other than these items, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lazzara74

customer_reviews.title: Way better than my shark vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Before using this vacuum I vacuumed my upstairs with my shark vacuum. The video shows the second time vacuuming my floor with my new dyson. The first time the bucket was full of dog hair the shark didn’t get, the second time emptying the bin is the video I took. Amazing how much dirt dust whatever all that stuff was that was in my carpet that the shark didn’t get.
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: not for anything that needs serious cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Might work well in a TV commercial, but for picking up dog hair, etc. it is worthless. Plugs up, shuts off automatically if it gets hot. Even when I dump the cannister when it is only half full and clean the filter after every use. My shop vac does a superior job to this piece of junk. False advertising sucked me in. I thought this unit would work for vacuuming up after dog hair and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We've had several vacuum cleaners. For some reason, we keep leaving Dyson. Always sorry and always happy when our new vacuum is a Dyson. This one (pet hair) is excellent, excellent suction, light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: AugustaDoc

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for .
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great . I was so cheap I did not want to pay that kind of money . Well I have had 3 Crappy vacuums that al broke all added up to almost more than the cost of this one that will last my At least 10 years . I can not believe how much dirt This picks up wow. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jet Boat Cracker

product_meta.title: Dyson Upright Vacuum Cleaner, Ball Animal 2, Iron/Purple
product_meta.description: Size:Ball Animal 2The Dyson Ball Animal 2 has the strongest suction of any vacuum. With even more power for tough tasks, no other vacuum has stronger suction at the cleaner head than the Ball Animal 2. It handles tough tasks easily, making it ideal for parents and pet-owners. The Ball animal 2 has an advanced self-adjusting cleaner head that automatically adjusts between carpets and hard floors - sealing in suction across all floors to tackle your toughest tasks. Its wand and hose release in one smooth action to make it easier to clean up high and under furniture. With hygienic bin emptying, there's no need to get your hands dirty - just push the button to release the dirt. Whole-machine filtration ensures that allergens and bacteria are trapped inside the machine, not expelled back into the home. The Dyson Ball Animal 2 vacuum comes with the tangle-free Turbine tool, which removes hair from carpets and upholstery without tangling. Dyson free 5 year warranty covers parts and labor, plus free shipping there and back. Suction tested to ASTM F558 at the cleaner head, dust-loaded, against upright market.power:Up to 100AW
feature_bullets: Strongest suction of any vacuum; Even more power for tough tasks
Self-adjusting cleaner head seals in suction across carpet, wood, vinyl, and tile floors
Tangle free turbine tool, stair tool, combination tool included
Whole-machine filtration ensures that allergens are trapped inside the machine, not expelled back into the home.
Hygienically empty the bin with the push of a button

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,351 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
